definition: wholeheartedly/heart and soul
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
concentrating one's thoughts and efforts/single-minded/bent on/intently
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united
of one heart and one mind (idiom)
to do two things at once (idiom)/to multitask/to divide one's attention
to multitask

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 并且轻度的一心多用者可能更擅长保持注意力。
神话尚未结束，韩国团结一心。

sentences.english: Would like to have one mind, not of Baekdu from.
sentences.chinese: 愿得一心人，白头不相离。

sentences.english: Little Cat listened to Old Cat's words and begin to fish intently.
sentences.chinese: 小猫听了老猫的话，就一心一意地钓鱼。

sentences.english: He was single -mindedly devoted to the hastening of freedom for the oppressed.
sentences.chinese: 他一心一意致力于早日让被压迫者获得自由。

sentences.english: All the rest of the Israelites were also of one mind to make David king.
sentences.chinese: 以色列其余的人也都一心要立大卫作王。

sentences.english: Edgar, in his anxiety for her, forgot her hated friend.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加一心为她焦急，也忘了她那可恨的朋友。

sentences.english: The Founders were protective of the fledgling democracy.
sentences.chinese: 美国的建国先贤一心要保护这个新兴的民主制度。

sentences.english: There are some who are impatient, has a bad temper and just want to finish the war fast.
sentences.chinese: 有些将领性格暴躁，没有忍耐性，只是一心追求速战。

sentences.english: With fingers poised over the keyboard, I'm faced with myriad options.
sentences.chinese: 双手悬空书桌，十指难落键盘，一心面对，众多选择。

sentences.english: We share one heart, one home, and one gloriousdestiny.
sentences.chinese: 我们万众一心，同住一个家园，共享辉煌命运。

sentences.english: Shortly after he achieved freedom he became a member of an organization that assisted fugitive slaves.
sentences.chinese: 亨森获得自由后不久就一心帮助逃亡奴隶。

sentences.english: Do not ask next two ears, one in the head-on embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 两耳不问身旁事，一心扑在绣品上。

sentences.english: She a heart deceive I am this stuff, should merely I don't know, this equitable runs without a track.
sentences.chinese: 她一心瞒着我此事，只当我不知，这才跑的无影无踪。
